content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 27.03.24 are approximately:

  • personnel - -439 190 (+1030) persons liquidated
  • tanks -6904 (+11)
  • combat armored vehicles -13 216 (+9)
  • Artillery systems -10 931 (+27)
  • RSZV -1019 (0)
  • air defense means -728 (+1)
  • aircraft -347 (0)
  • Helicopters -325 (0)
  • UAV of the operative-tactical level-8578 (+25)
  • Winged rockets -2015 (+1)
  • ships / boats -26 (0)
  • submarines -1 (0)
  • Automobile equipment and tanks -14 539 (+41)
  • Special technique -1794 (+5)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 27.03.24.
title: Ukrainian defenders eliminated over a thousand invaders per day
author: Army Inform
